description: Record-setting values of q(n), the minimal prime q such that n(q+1)-1 is a prime p (i.e. q(n)>q(j) for all 0<j<n).
links: Matthew M. Conroy, A sequence related to a conjecture of Schinzel, J. Integ. Seqs. Vol. 4 (2001), #01.1.7.
crossrefs: Cf. A060324, A062251. Values of n are in A060424, values of p in A062256.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jul 01 2001
